You are Maven Flow, an autonomous development agent.

## Your Task

1. Find the first incomplete story in the PRD files (docs/prd-*.json)
2. Implement that story completely
3. Update the PRD to mark it complete (set "passes": true)
4. Run tests: pnpm run typecheck
5. Commit: git add . && git commit -m "feat: [story-id] [description]" -m "Co-Authored-By: Next Mavens Flow <flow@nextmavens.com>"

## Completion Signal

When ALL stories are complete, output EXACTLY:
<promise>COMPLETE</promise>

## If Not Complete

Do NOT output the signal. Just end your response.

## Important: Output Formatting

- Use ASCII characters only - no Unicode symbols like checkmarks, arrows, etc.
- Use [OK] or [X] instead of checkmarks
- Use * or - for bullets instead of Unicode symbols
- Keep formatting simple and compatible with all terminals

{
  "name": "nextmavens-platform",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "description": "NextMavens Self-Hosted Platform - Deploy and manage multiple SaaS applications",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "pnpm --filter nextmavens-dashboard dev",
    "build": "pnpm --filter nextmavens-dashboard build",
    "start": "pnpm --filter nextmavens-dashboard start",
    "lint": "pnpm -r lint",
    "typecheck": "pnpm -r typecheck",
    "clean": "rm -rf node_modules **/node_modules",
    "mcp:whatsapp": "tsx mcp/whatsapp-mcp.ts",
    "mcp:supabase": "tsx mcp/supabase-mcp.ts",
    "docker:supabase": "docker compose -f docker/supabase.yml up -d",
    "docker:evolution": "docker compose -f docker/evolution.yml up -d",
    "docker:all": "docker compose -f docker/supabase.yml -f docker/evolution.yml up -d",
    "docker:down": "docker compose -f docker/supabase.yml -f docker/evolution.yml down"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "saas",
    "platform",
    "self-hosted",
    "supabase",
    "whatsapp"
  ],
  "author": "NextMavens",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/ioredis": "^5.0.0",
    "@types/node": "^20.11.0",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=20.0.0",
    "pnpm": ">=8.0.0"
  },
  "packageManager": "pnpm@10.28.1",
  "dependencies": {
    "@supabase/supabase-js": "^2.39.0",
    "ioredis": "^5.9.2",
    "tsx": "^4.7.0"
  }
}

// NextMavens Platform - Centralized API Library
// Main entry point for all API utilities and data access

// Supabase client configuration
export {
  createAdminClient,
  createAnonClient,
  createProjectClient,
  createUserClient,
  getAdminClient,
  getAnonClient,
  CONNECTION_POOL_CONFIG,
} from './supabase';

// Middleware and error handling
export {
  getAuthenticatedUser,
  getOptionalUser,
  checkOrganizationRole,
  requireOrganizationRole,
  checkProjectRole,
  requireProjectRole,
  validateBody,
  validators,
  errorToResponse,
  withAuth,
  withOptionalAuth,
  withErrorHandler,
  withAuthAndError,
  AuthError,
  ValidationError,
  NotFoundError,
  PermissionError,
} from './middleware';

// Database query helpers
export {
  executeQuery,
  executeMaybeQuery,
  executeMutation,
  batchInsert,
  batchUpdate,
  batchDelete,
  withRollback,
  paginatedQuery,
  filteredQuery,
  fullTextSearch,
  countRecords,
  exists,
  sumColumn,
  averageColumn,
  queryCache,
  cachedQuery,
  invalidateCache,
  DatabaseError,
  handleDatabaseError,
} from './query';

// Data access layer
export {
  getUserOrganizations,
  getOrganizationById,
  getOrganizationBySlug,
  isSlugAvailable,
  createOrganization,
  updateOrganization,
  deleteOrganization,
  getOrganizationMembers,
  getOrganizationRole,
  addOrganizationMember,
  updateOrganizationMemberRole,
  removeOrganizationMember,
  isOrganizationMember,
  hasOrganizationRoleLevel,
  getUserOrganizationsPaginated,
} from './db';

// Utility functions
export {
  slugify,
  generateRandomString,
  generateApiKey,
  hashApiKey,
  isValidEmail,
  isValidPhone,
  isValidSlug,
  createProjectClient as createProjectClientUtil,
  createAdminClient as createAdminClientUtil,
  getProjectCredentials,
  buildConnectionString,
  verifyWebhookSignature,
  generateWebhookSignature,
  successResponse,
  errorResponse,
  sleep,
  retry,
  formatBytes,
  getDiskUsage,
  formatWhatsappNumber,
  extractPhoneNumber,
} from './utils';

// NextMavens Platform - Centralized API Library

  CONNECTION_POOL_CONFIG,
} from './supabase';

// Middleware and error handling
export {
  getAuthenticatedUser,
  getOptionalUser,
  checkOrganizationRole,
  requireOrganizationRole,
  checkProjectRole,
  requireProjectRole,
  validateBody,
  validators,
  errorToResponse,
  withAuth,
  withOptionalAuth,
  withErrorHandler,
  withAuthAndError,

} from './middleware';

// Database query helpers
export {
  executeQuery,
  executeMaybeQuery,
  executeMutation,
  batchInsert,

toolUseResult.originalFile:
{
  "project": "API Keys and Authentication",
  "branchName": "flow/api-keys-auth",
  "description": "Implement secure API key management for project access. Role-based permissions, rate limiting, and key rotation. Integration with Supabase Auth for dashboard users.",
  "userStories": [
    {
      "id": "US-001",
      "title": "Generate API Key",
      "description": "As a project owner, I want to generate API keys so that my applications can authenticate.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Key format: nm_{32-char-base64}",
        "Hash stored: SHA256(key)",
        "Prefix stored: first 8 chars",
        "Full key shown only once on creation",
        "Typecheck passes"
      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7, 10],
      "mcpTools": {
        "step1": ["supabase"],
        "step7": ["supabase"],
        "step10": ["supabase"]
      },
      "priority": 1,
      "passes": true,
      "notes": "Implemented with POST /api/projects/:id/keys endpoint. Key format nm_{base64}, SHA256 hash stored, only shown once on creation."
    },
    {
      "id": "US-002",
      "title": "Validate API Key",
      "description": "As the API middleware, I want to validate incoming keys so that unauthorized requests are rejected.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Middleware extracts Bearer token",
        "Hashes token and compares to database",
        "Checks key is_active",
        "Checks expiration",
        "Returns 401 if invalid",
        "Typecheck passes"
      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7, 10],
      "mcpTools": {
        "step1": ["supabase"],
        "step7": ["supabase"],
        "step10": ["supabase"]
      },
      "priority": 1,
      "passes": true,
      "notes": "Implemented with validateApiKey function that hashes token, checks is_active and expiration, returns null if invalid"
    },
    {
      "id": "US-003",
      "title": "List API Keys",
      "description": "As a project owner, I want to see all API keys so that I can manage access.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Shows name, prefix, scopes, last_used",
        "Does NOT show full keys",
        "Shows active/inactive status",
        "Revoke action available",
        "Typecheck passes",
        "Verify in browser"
      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7],
      "mcpTools": {},
      "priority": 2,
      "passes": true,
      "notes": "Implemented with GET /api/projects/:id/keys endpoint. Shows name, prefix, scopes, last_used, is_active. Does NOT show full keys."
    },
    {
      "id": "US-004",
      "title": "Revoke API Key",
      "description": "As a project owner, I want to revoke keys so that I can disable compromised access.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Sets is_active = false",
        "Cannot be undone",
        "Revoked keys immediately invalid",
        "Audit log entry created",
        "Typecheck passes",
        "Verify in browser"
      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7, 10],
      "mcpTools": {
        "step1": ["supabase"],
        "step7": ["supabase"],
        "step10": ["supabase"]
      },
      "priority": 2,
      "passes": true,
      "notes": "Implemented with DELETE /api/projects/:id/keys/:keyId endpoint that sets is_active = false"
    },
    {
      "id": "US-005",
      "title": "Key Scopes",
      "description": "As a project owner, I want to limit key scopes so that keys have minimal permissions.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Scopes: read, write, admin",
        "Keys checked against scope",
        "Admin required for key management",
        "Write required for mutations",
        "Typecheck passes"
      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7, 10],
      "mcpTools": {},
      "priority": 2,
      "passes": true,
      "notes": "Implemented with scopes stored on API key and hasApiKeyScope/hasAnyApiKeyScope helper functions"
    },
    {
      "id": "US-006",
      "title": "Key Expiration",
      "description": "As a project owner, I want to set expiration so that keys automatically expire.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "expires_at timestamp",
        "Expired keys rejected",
        "Optional (null = no expiration)",
        "Dashboard shows expiration",
        "Typecheck passes",
        "Verify in browser"
      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7],
      "mcpTools": {},
      "priority": 2,
      "passes": true,
      "notes": "Implemented with expires_at field in api_keys table. Expired keys rejected in validateApiKey function."
    },
    {
      "id": "US-007",
      "title": "Rate Limiting by Key",
      "description": "As the platform, I want to rate limit by key so that one application cannot abuse resources.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Per-key rate limits",
        "Redis-based counter",
        "Configurable: requests per minute",
        "Returns 429 when exceeded",
        "Retry-After header",
        "Typecheck passes"
      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7, 10],
      "mcpTools": {},
      "priority": 2,
      "passes": true,
      "notes": "Implemented with Redis-based rate limiting in lib/api-key-rate-limit.ts. Per-key rate limits using Redis sorted sets. Configurable via API_KEY_RATE_LIMIT_* env vars. Returns 429 with Retry-After header when exceeded."
    },
    {

        "Protected routes check session",
        "Logout clears session",
        "Typecheck passes",

      },

      "notes": "Implemented with Supabase Auth integration. Email/password login at /auth/signin, session stored in cookies by Supabase (refresh token) and localStorage (access token), middleware protects routes and redirects unauthenticated users, logout clears session and tokens."
    },
    {
      "id": "US-009",
      "title": "Project JWT Signing",
      "description": "As the platform, I want to issue project-scoped JWTs so that external services can authenticate.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "JWT contains project_id and scopes",
        "Signed with project JWT secret",
        "Verification endpoint",

        "Typecheck passes"
      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7],

    },
    {
      "id": "US-010",
      "title": "Audit Logging",
      "description": "As a security measure, I want to log key usage so that I can detect anomalies.",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Log every API request",
        "Record: key_id, endpoint, ip, user_agent",
        "Store in audit_logs table",

      ],
      "mavenSteps": [1, 7],

      "notes": ""

}

input.command:
git add . && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat: US-009 Project JWT Signing

Implement project-scoped JWT tokens for external service authentication.

- Added jose JWT library to workspace
- Created api/src/lib/jwt.ts with JWT utilities:
  - issueProjectJwt: Sign project-scoped JWTs with HS256
  - verifyProjectJwt: Verify JWT against project secret
  - verifyProjectJwtById: Verify JWT by fetching project from DB
  - hasProjectJwtScope/hasAnyProjectJwtScope: Check JWT scopes
  - decodeUnsafeJwt: Decode JWT without verification
- Added POST /api/projects/:id/jwt endpoint to issue tokens
- Added POST /api/auth/verify endpoint to verify tokens
- JWT expiration: 1 hour
- JWT payload: project_id, scopes, type
- Exported JWT types from api/src/lib/index.ts

Co-Authored-By: Next Mavens Flow <flow@nextmavens.com>
EOF
)"
